channel.name: Euronews FR
channel.title: Brussels, My Love
channel.desc: From the economy to the climate and the EU's role in world affairs, this talk show sheds light on European affairs and the issues that impact on our daily lives as Europeans. Tune in to understand the ins and outs of European politics.
